content.prompt_es: Choose the best answer for each question related to debate and discussion.
content.explanation: El propósito principal de un debate es presentar y argumentar diferentes puntos de vista sobre un tema.
content.stimulus_en: What is the primary purpose of a debate?

content.prompt_es: Choose the best answer for each question related to debate and discussion.
content.explanation: Cuando no estás de acuerdo, es importante expresar tu desacuerdo claramente, y esta frase lo hace.
content.stimulus_en: Which phrase is most appropriate when you disagree with someone in a discussion?

content.prompt_es: Choose the best answer for each question related to debate and discussion.
content.explanation: Un contraargumento es un punto que desafía o refuta el argumento de otra persona, crucial en un debate.
content.stimulus_en: In a debate, what is a counterargument?

options.text: A point that supports your argument
A point that refutes another argument

content.prompt_es: Choose the best answer for each question related to debate and discussion.
content.explanation: Usar hechos y ejemplos fortalece tu posición y ayuda a convencer a la audiencia.
content.stimulus_en: What is an effective strategy when defending your point of view?

content.prompt_es: Choose the best answer for each question related to debate and discussion.
content.explanation: Resumir al final ayuda a reafirmar tus puntos y a clarificar tu posición a la audiencia.
content.stimulus_en: When is it appropriate to summarize in a debate?

options.text: When you have no more points
At the end of the debate
